de.weltraumschaf.commons.testing

Class CapturedOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.commons.testing.CapturedOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public final class CapturedOutput
extends Object
implements org.junit.rules.TestRule
    This rule captures all output written to System.out and System.err.

    This rule redirects the constant print streams for out/err to an CapturingPrintStream before each test and backups the origin streams after each test. 

    public class OutputTest {

     &#064;Rule
     public final CapturedOutput output = new CapturedOutput();

     &#064;Test
     public void captureOut() {
         output.expectOut("foobar");
         output.expectOut(not("snafu"));

         System.out.print("foobar");
     }

     &#064;Test
     public void captureErr() {
         output.expectErr("foobar");
         output.expectErr(not("snafu"));

         System.err.print("foobar");
     }

 }
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
